s.text: In every study, some mothers must serve as a comparison group, and that's where the trouble begins.
And some subjects receive placebos because, unlike penicillin for Alabama, the full AZT regimen is out of reach for poor countries.

Researchers giving placebos, they said, were knowingly killing children.
It offends them to see researchers accepting the high cost of American medical care as a given.
2) It's done for local benefit (measuring a new therapy against placebo isn't useful for the West; we'd switch only if it were as effective as the more complex therapy).
